title: File Format
content:
Description of each line    Every map created via the map editor of Boring Man - OTSC is composed of 5 lines:
 The title of the map Whether the map is a climb map.  1 means it is a climb map 0 means it is not a climb map   The Steam workshop ID of the map.  If the ID is -1, it means it is not on the workshop.   A JSON containing all the objects of the map and the configuration of the map.  This JSON will always contain a Config key, even if the map is empty.   A JSON containing the MD5 file checksums for each image used in the map.  This JSON can be empty ({}) if no tiles is put on the map.    Map objects and map configuration    The JSON of the 4th line are the map objects and the map configuration.
{"OBJ0": {...}, "Config": { ... }, "OBJ12": { ... }} Map configuration    The map configuration is always found via the key Config in the JSON.
Full documentation about map configuration entry here.
Map objects    All map objects have keys called OBJ[number].
Full documentation about map objects entries here.

title: Map Config
content:
Example of a map configuration with all fields:
"Config": { "Ambience": "9", "Author": "Violet", "Bkgd1Amb": "8", "Bkgd1AmbCol": "4210752", "Bkgd1File": "background2.png", "Bkgd1HPara": "1", "Bkgd1Hspeed": "0", "Bkgd1MD5": "92043a581db0c50efb7856aa840f885c", "Bkgd1VPara": "0", "Bkgd1Vspeed": "0", "Bkgd1XOff": "0", "Bkgd1XTile": "1", "Bkgd1YOff": "0", "Bkgd1YTile": "1", "Bkgd2File": "", "Bkgd2HPara": "0", "Bkgd2Hspeed": "0", "Bkgd2MD5": "", "Bkgd2VPara": "0", "Bkgd2Vspeed": "0", "Bkgd2XOff": "0", "Bkgd2XTile": "1", "Bkgd2YOff": "0", "Bkgd2YTile": "1", "Bkgd3File": "", "Bkgd3HPara": "0", "Bkgd3Hspeed": "0", "Bkgd3MD5": "", "Bkgd3VPara": "0", "Bkgd3Vspeed": "0", "Bkgd3XOff": "0", "Bkgd3XTile": "1", "Bkgd3YOff": "0", "Bkgd3YTile": "1", "BkgdColor1": "4982848", "BkgdColor2": "3666080", "Climb": "0", "DecalDepth": "-200", "DivChc": "25", "MapHeight": "2050", "MapWidth": "6528", "Name": "D-Day", "Preview": "BoringManGame_2019-07-31_01-28-42.png", "SeaDepth": "2", "SeaLevel": "1920", "SeaType": "0", "ShowCol": "0", "ShowLog": "0", "ShowPath": "0", "TotalGates": "934", "Workshop": "1818514010" } Properties    Ambience    Description    Values    Author    Description    Author of the map
Values    Author of the map.
Bkgd1Amb    Description    Values    Bkgd1AmbCol    Description    Values    Bkgd1File    Description    Values    Bkgd1HPara    Description    Values    Bkgd1Hspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd1MD5    Description    Values    Bkgd1VPara    Description    Values    Bkgd1Vspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd1XOff    Description    Values    Bkgd1XTile    Description    Values    Bkgd1YOff    Description    Values    Bkgd1YTile    Description    Values    Bkgd2File    Description    Values    Bkgd2HPara    Description    Values    Bkgd2Hspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd2MD5    Description    Values    Bkgd2VPara    Description    Values    Bkgd2Vspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd2XOff    Description    Values    Bkgd2XTile    Description    Values    Bkgd2YOff    Description    Values    Bkgd2YTile    Description    Values    Bkgd3File    Description    Values    Bkgd3HPara    Description    Values    Bkgd3Hspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd3MD5    Description    Values    Bkgd3VPara    Description    Values    Bkgd3Vspeed    Description    Values    Bkgd3XOff    Description    Values    Bkgd3XTile    Description    Values    Bkgd3YOff    Description    Values    Bkgd3YTile    Description    Values    BkgdColor1    Description    Values    BkgdColor2    Description    Values    Climb    Description    Values    DecalDepth    Description    Values    DivChc    Description    Values    MapHeight    Description    Values    MapWidth    Description    Values    Name    Description    Values    Preview    Description    Values    SeaDepth    Description    Values    SeaLevel    Description    Values    SeaType    Description    Values    ShowCol    Description    Show collisions as host of the map.
Values     1: Show collisions 0: Don’t show collisions  ShowLog    Description    Show logic as host of the map.
Values     1: Show logic 0: Don’t show logic  ShowPath    Description    Show AI path as host of the map.
Values     1: Show AI path 0: Don’t show AI path  TotalGates    Description    Total number of gates in the map.
Values    0 <=: Positive number.
Workshop    Description    Workshop ID of the map.
Values     -1 if not on the workshop 0 <: Strictly positive if on the workshop

title: Location
content:
You can find your maps at:
 On Windows: %localappdata%/BoringManRewrite/maps/ On Linux: ~/.config/BoringManRewrite/maps/

title: bmap-to-json documentation
content:
What’s this?    This documentation has 2 goals:
 It serves as documentation for the bmap-to-json typescript library. It documents how are defined maps in the game Boring Man - OTSC.  bmap-to-json    Utility library made in TypeScript to work with bmap.txt (map file format of Boring Man - OTSC).

title: bmap.txt format
content:
Description    bmap.txt is a file that represents a map from the game Boring Man - OTSC 2.0.
Table of contents     File Format: What each line of a bmap.txt represents Location: How to find maps on Windows or Linux
